item.many_bows.arcane_bow.tooltip: Unleashes a mystical spread of arrows with arcane energy.
item.many_bows.arcane_bow.tooltip.abilit: Ability: Fires three arrows in a spread pattern, dealing extra arcane damage.
item.many_bows.arcane_bow.tooltip.legend: Ancient secrets lie within its enchanted limbs...
item.many_bows.solar_bow.tooltip: §eA powerful bow charged by the sun
item.many_bows.solar_bow.tooltip.ability: §cShoots flaming solar arrows on full charge.
item.many_bows.frostbite_bow.tooltip: A bow forged from the chilling essence of ice.
item.many_bows.frostbite_bow.tooltip.abi: Shoots frost arrows that slow and freeze enemies on full charge.
item.too_many_bows.arc_heavens.tooltip: Unleash the power of the storm.
item.too_many_bows.arc_heavens.tooltip.a: Strikes foes with lightning on a direct hit.
item.too_many_bows.sonic_bow.tooltip: Harness the destructive force of the Warden's roar
item.too_many_bows.sonic_bow.tooltip.abi: Shoots a powerful shockwave that pierces enemies with immense force
item.too_many_bows.sonic_bow.tooltip.leg: Forged from the echoes of the Deep Dark, this bow unleashes pure devastation.
item.many_bows.dragons_breath_bow.toolti: Fires a charged arrow that spawns dragon's breath upon impact.
item.too_many_bows.verdant_viper_bow.too: A bow that harnesses the venom of nature.
Shoots arrows that leave behind a poisonous cloud.
It is said this bow was forged from the fangs of the great serpent king.
item.too_many_bows.flame_bow.tooltip.abi: Shoots flaming arrows that cause fiery explosions.
item.too_many_bows.flame_bow.tooltip.leg: A legendary bow forged in the heart of a volcano.
item.too_many_bows.tidal_bow.tooltip: The power of the ocean flows through this bow.
item.too_many_bows.tidal_bow.tooltip.abi: Shoots arrows imbued with the force of waves.
item.too_many_bows.tidal_bow.tooltip.leg: A bow that harnesses the ancient power of the seas.
item.too_many_bows.cursed_flame_bow.tool: A bow imbued with cursed flames, known to halt regeneration and burn with inextinguishable fury.
Ignites foes with cursed fire: blocks all regen, can't be extinguished by water, and deals a heart of damage per tick.
item.many_bows.scatter_bow.tooltip: A bow that shoots arrows in all directions
item.many_bows.ancient_sage_bow.tooltip: An ancient weapon of unmatched power.
Only the wise can wield its true might.
